attributes.action: hand over power to gordon brown by 28th february 2007 so that gordon can then get on with the job of repairing the damage that has been left behind
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is in complete paralysis and it is harming our country.  Mr Blair needs to leave not only for the good of his party, but for the good of the united kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
